*433 Error from the District Court of Kingfisher County; before C. F. Irwin, Trial Judge. IF. C. Stevens, for plaintiff in error. Boynton <£■ Smith, for defendant in .error.' Per Curiam:

Tlie judgment of the court below is affirmed in these cases upon the reasoning and conclusion of the “McLain Land and Investment Company v. Elim Jelts, et al.,” decided at this term.
